actors.name: story_by
actors.text: Story by Kelly Weil

actors.name: paintings_by
actors.text: Paintings by Jay Jocham

actors.name: edited_by
actors.text: Edited by Susan Rensberger

actors.name: click_prompt
actors.text: CLICK TO TURN THE PAGE

actors.name: Once_upon_a_time
actors.text:
Once upon a time,
 a zebra named Zink
 lived in the Lipis Jungle
 with her mother, her father,
 and her brother Fink.

actors.name: Zink_was_a_normal
actors.text:
Zink was a normal
zebra in every way.
She had four legs, two ears,
one nose, one mouth,
 one tail ...

actors.name: and_spots
actors.text: and spots.

actors.name: All_the_other_zebras
actors.text:
All the other zebras
- even her mother, father
and brother - had stripes.

actors.name: Because_Zink_had_spots
actors.text:
Because Zink had spots,
the other zebras
wouldn't play with her.

actors.name: Because_the_other_zebras_had
actors.text:
Because the other zebras had
stripes, they thought
Zink looked odd.

actors.name: One_day_Fink_said_to_Zink
actors.text:
One day Fink said to Zink,
"Why do you have spots?
They're so weird."

actors.name: One_day_Zink_said_to_Fink
actors.text:
Zink said to Fink,
"Why do you have stripes?
They're so weird."

actors.name: Zink_and_Fink_couldn't
actors.text:
Zink and Fink couldn't
decide who was right.

actors.name: No_one_in_the_Lipis_Jungle
actors.text:
No one in the Lipis Jungle
seemed to have
the answer.

actors.name: Finally_Zink_and_Fink
actors.text:
Finally Zink and Fink
went home
to ask their parents.

actors.name: Which_one_of_us_is_weird?
actors.text:
"Which one of us is weird?"
they asked.

actors.name: Neither_of_you
actors.text:
"Neither of you"
their parents said.

actors.name: Whatever_you_are
actors.text:
"Whatever you are
is what you are,"
said their mother.

actors.name: We're_all_different
actors.text:
"We're all different,"
said their father.

actors.name: Being_different
actors.text:
"Being different
makes you special."

actors.name: Then_everyone_nuzzled_...
actors.text: Then everyone nuzzled ...

actors.name: and_Zink_and_Fink
actors.text:
and Zink and Fink
went out to play.

actors.name: The_end
actors.text: The end.

actors.name: story_by
actors.text: Story by Kelly Weil

actors.name: paintings_by
actors.text: Paintings by Jay Jocham
